title: Liverpool 1-4 Everton, Manchester United 4-0 Leicester, Spurs v West Ham and more: WSL – live
summary: The Women’s Super League features several exciting matchups, including Tottenham vs. West Ham, Liverpool vs. Everton, and Manchester United vs. Leicester. Billy Munday will be hosting the coverage of these games. Fans can look forward to an action-packed day of women's football.

title: F1: Italian Grand Prix updates – live
summary: Tom Bassam will provide live updates during the Italian Grand Prix at Monza. Fans can follow along for lap-by-lap coverage of the race. Stay tuned for real-time information and insights.

title: ‘It’s my second home!’ Gen Z and the sudden, surprising boom of luxury gyms
summary: Despite the cost of living crisis, young people in cramped or rundown housing may be willing to pay a premium for access to expensive fitness facilities. These spaces are seen as a necessary sanctuary, providing a respite from their challenging living conditions. The demand highlights a shift in priorities among this demographic, valuing well-being and personal space.

title: A new dream man has dropped – the laid-back, confident beefcake | Emma Beddington
summary: Emma Beddington suggests that Travis Kelce embodies the ideal man, influenced by his relationship with Taylor Swift. The piece explores Kelce's traits and how they resonate with contemporary ideals of masculinity. Beddington posits that Swift may have insight into this phenomenon.

title: Coronation Street’s Katherine Kelly looks back: ‘My friends were very accepting of me being a bit different’
summary: The actor discusses her comfort in wearing men’s clothing and reflects on her bohemian upbringing. She recounts how a short-term role in a soap opera unexpectedly turned into a six-year commitment. Her experience highlights the evolving nature of her career and personal style.
